mission_quote: We seek scholars, leaders, athletes, and gentlemen — men of character who will carry our values beyond the university.
paragraph1: Gamma Omicron has been a cornerstone of Ohio University's Greek community since its 1930 chartering. With over 90 years of brotherhood — including a celebrated period following the chapter's 1987 refounding — the active chapter continues to set the standard for academic excellence, community service, and leadership development.
paragraph2: Located at 12 N College Street, the chapter house serves as home to an active brotherhood committed to the Pi Kappa Alpha values of scholarship, leadership, athletics, and fellowship.
paragraph3: Alumni are encouraged to engage with the active chapter through the Advisory Board, Feed‑a‑Pike nights, and rush events. Your mentorship and support are invaluable to the next generation of Gamma Omicron brothers.
smythe_label: Smythe Trophy Recipients — Chapter Excellence Award
